DOC.brief_summary: The purpose BIOLUX P-III Spain registry investigate safety clinical performance Passeo-18 Lux Drug Coated Balloon treatment long atherosclerotic femoropoliteal artery lesion daily clinical practice
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year minimum age require local regulation Subject must willing sign Patient Data Release Form ( PDRF ) Patient Informed Consent ( PIC ) applicable Subject classify Rutherford class 4 , 5 6 TASC C D lesion ( ) femoropopliteal artery Lesion length > 15 cm suitable endovascular treatment treat schedule treated Passeo18 Lux drug release balloon Life expectancy ≤ 1 year Subject currently participate another investigational drug device study reach primary endpoint yet . Subject pregnant planning become pregnant course study . Rutherford class < 4 Failure successfully cross target lesion guide wire ( successful crossing mean tip guide wire distal target lesion absence flow limit dissection perforation ) . Intraprocedural decision proceed Passeo18 Lux DCB reason related device ( instance blood flow limit dissection predilatation ) .
